name: Incarnate to human
description:
Incarnate to human

If a robot had self-awareness like a human, would he still be willing to serve humans? You look at the collapsed warehouse in front of you and think this is the answer. This was no accident, but premeditated sabotage. As you dig deeper and deeper into the investigation, you gradually find out the truth...

Controls – Use the mouse to click to understand the story and make choices to find out the truth.

________________________________________________________

This game is a Platformer with narrative elements made by me, I used Photoshop to draw all illustrations and implemented in Ink and Unity. The illustration I have drawn is a bit simple due to time, but it is the most suitable one that I have picked after trying several styles. I tried to come across in a simpler way to match the style of the story. I hope this hasn't detracted from your gaming experience.

Thank you for playing!
